translations.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE document SYSTEM "CommonMark.dtd">
<document xmlns="http://commonmark.org/xml/1.0">
  <paragraph>
   <text xml:space="preserve">See </text>
   <math asis="true" math="true">$a$</math>
   <text xml:space="preserve">
      <text xml:space="preserve"> an equation with a note afterwards </text>
     <squary>
        <notranslate>^1</notranslate>
      </squary>
     <text>.</text>
   </text>
  </paragraph>
  <paragraph>
   <text xml:space="preserve">
     <squary><notranslate>^1</notranslate>:</squary>
      <text> a footnote.</text>
   </text>
  </paragraph>
</document>
